hero.name: SHUJA B
hero.description: Open to job opportunities worldwide. Passionate about building polished, intuitive, and thoughtful digital experiences that leave a mark.

about.title: Bit About me/
about.description:
I’m a software engineer with a master’s degree in Cloud Computing and experience as a front-end-focused full-stack developer.

I work across the stack, building scalable web applications with Vue.js, React.js, and Next.js, backed by Node.js or Laravel. I like owning features end-to-end, integrating AI-powered tools into real products, and keeping code clean, performant, and easy to scale. I enjoy collaborating with designers and other engineers to turn ideas into polished experiences.

skillSet.title: Full stack developer
